properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Far above all. Far above all. Jesus the crucified, far above all. Low at His footstool adoring we fall, God has exalted Him – far above all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Far above all. Far above all. Jesus the crucified, far above all. Low at His footstool adoring we fall, God has exalted Him – far above all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Far above all. Far above all. Jesus the crucified, far above all. Low at His footstool adoring we fall, God has exalted Him – far above all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His is the kingdom from pole unto pole, Far above all while the ages shall roll, With Him the victors, who follow’d His call, Share in His royalty far above all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Far above all. Far above all. Jesus the crucified, far above all. Low at His footstool adoring we fall, God has exalted Him – far above all.{/lang-eng}
